text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly identifies that the Belgian officers observed unmarked anchored lines and correctly cites Article 5 of the Convention, stating: \"Article 5 of the Convention requires that '[n]ets, lines and other gear anchored in the sea and nets or lines which drift in the sea shall be marked in order to indicate their position and extent,' in accordance with Annex IV.\" This directly satisfies the criterion.", "criterion_id": "criterion 2"}
